member.name: M:SemesterAverage.frmSemesterAverage.txtGrade1_Leave(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Once the user tabs away from the textbox, run validation on the input and return focus to the textbox if validation fails. If it succeeds then convert the number to a letter grade.
